item.title: I might go buy a DS for this game
item.dc:creator: Spooks
item.description:
It looks cool. And haz crowbarz.

Ramirezoid:

Looks pretty cool , but the style is just unpleasant. it’d be cool if they allowed you to draw every single element of the game.

That reminded me of
https://store.steampowered.com/app/29150/

Slightly offtopic, but you draw there too. It’s just an indie puzzle game so you don’t really expect much but cruising with a penis jetpack is definitely worth the try.

(Also, Crayon Physics Deluxe, but I’m sure you know that one.)[/SIZE]

Read full topic
